Entry.JapaneseText: フランツさんって やっぱりすごい冒険家なんだネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Franz sure is an amazing adventurer.

Entry.JapaneseText: だって、ボクたちがシャオルーンに乗ってやっと 見つけた、この空中庭園に自力で来たんだヨ！
Entry.EnglishText: Well, we had to ride on Shaorune to finally find this place, but he made it to this sky garden on his own!

Entry.JapaneseText: 冒険家の執念、というヤツだろうな。
Entry.EnglishText: That's what they call an adventurer's tenacity, I gather.
